00006 use strict;
00007 our @ISA = qw(Parser::List);

00009 #
00010 #  Check that the entries are numbers.
00011 #
00012 sub _check {
00013   my $self = shift; return if $self->context->flag("allowBadOperands");
00014   foreach my $x (@{$self->{coords}}) {
00015     $self->Error("Sets can't contain infinity") if $x->{isInfinite};
00016     $self->Error("Entries in a set must be real numbers") unless $x->isRealNumber;
00017   }
00018 }
